title: No capsule
body:
I finished a ranked game and recieved a capsule, but I can't seem to find it at 'loot'?

What to do? Please help

replies.body: Was this possibly a capsule you would have gotten from leveling up actually? It looks like you should have been given a *level up* capsule for level 36 but it wasn't added correctly as far as I'm seeing. Refresh your client though, you should have it now ^_^!
